mapper.select: select no,title,content,fname,rfname,to_char(rdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') as rdate, hits from lawtion_notice where no=#{no}
mapper.update: update lawtion_notice set hits=hits+1 where no=#{no}
update lawtion_notice set title=#{title},content=#{content},fname=#{fname}, rfname=#{rfname} where no=#{no}
update lawtion_notice set title=#{title},content=#{content} where no=#{no}
mapper.select: select rfname from lawtion_notice where no =#{no}

select * from (select no,title,rdate,hits,content,fname,lag(no,1,0) over (order by no) as per_seq,lag(title,1,'이전글없음') over (order by no) as pre_title,lag(to_char(rdate,'yyyy-mm-dd')) over (order by no) as pre_rdate, lag(hits,1,0) over (order by no) as pre_hits, lag(content,1,'이전글없음') over (order by no) as pre_content,lag(fname,1,'이전글없음') over (order by no) as pre_fname from lawtion_notice) where no=#{no}

select * from (select no,title,rdate,hits,content,fname,lead(no,1,0) over (order by no) as next_seq,lead(title,1,'이후글없음') over (order by no) as next_title,lag(to_char(rdate,'yyyy-mm-dd')) over (order by no) as pre_rdate, lead(hits,1,0) over (order by no) as next_hits, lead(content,1,'이후글없음') over (order by no) as next_content,lead(fname,1,'이후글없음') over (order by no) as next_fname from lawtion_notice) where no=#{no}
